title: Peanut Sauce
source: Lemongrass and Lime (Pig & Khao) - Leah Cohen
categories: Lemongrass and Lime (Pig & Khao) - Leah Cohen
ingredients: - ¼ cup canned Thai red curry paste
- ¾ cup unsweetened natural peanut butter
- 3 tablespoons apple cider or white wine vinegar
- 2 tablespoons chili-garlic sauce, such as Huy Fong
directions: 1. Combine the coconut milk, curry paste, peanut butter, sugar, vinegar, chili-garlic sauce, salt, and ½ cup of water in a medium saucepan and bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for 5 minutes.
2. Remove from the heat and let cool to room temperature. Use immediately or transfer to a container with a tight-fitting lid and refrigerate for up to 1 week.
